experience.description:
1. Developed a network scanning and monitoring tool designed to efficiently manage and oversee a large-scale network comprising over 10,000 devices, including switches, cameras, routers, UPS units, and radio frequency equipment.
The tool is also capable of generating comprehensive reports for devices, including details on uptime, downtime, and log history.
The tool can also automatically create issues for down devices, manage issue assignments and resolutions, and generate detailed issue logs.
Targeted to be used by Network Engineers and IT staff.
Technologies used: javascript, nextjs, python, fastapi, sqlite, material UI.
2. Developed visitor management system for Delhi Sachivalay from scratch.
System includes modules for guards, receptionists, administrators, and complaint officers.
Implemented QR code system for visitor entry logging.
Handles a weekly footfall of over 1000 visitors, ensuring smooth operations and heightened security measures.
Technologies used: Javascript, Reactjs, Nestjs, Postgresql, tailwindcss.
